select o.order_code, o.order_state, o.buyer_tel, o.all_number, o.all_price, o.buyer_name, o.version, g.good_code, g.good_name, g.sell_price, g.good_introduce,in d.total_number, g.pictureUrl from t_sys_order as o left join t_sys_order_detail d on o.order_code = d.order_code left join t_sys_goods as g on d.good_code = g.good_code where o.is_delete = 0
and o.order_state in
#{item}
order by o.order_code

select s.store_name, concat(s.province_name, s.downtown_name, s.area_name, s.address) address, o.order_code, o.all_number, o.all_price, o.buyer_tel, o.buyer_name, o.create_time, o.order_state, g.good_code, g.good_name, g.sell_price, g.good_introduce, d.total_number, g.pictureUrl, o.version from t_sys_order as o left join t_sys_store as s on o.store_code = s.store_code left join t_sys_order_detail as d on o.order_code = d.order_code left join t_sys_goods g on d.good_code = g.good_code where o.is_delete = 0 and o.order_code = #{orderCode} order by o.order_code
mapper.update: update t_sys_order set order_state = #{orderState}, version = version + 1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = now() where is_delete = 0 and order_code = #{orderCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select u.user_name driverName, u.tel from t_sys_store as s left join t_sys_user as u on s.province_code = u.province_code and s.downtown_code = u.downtown_code and s.area_code = u.area_code and u.is_delete = 0 where s.shopkeeper_code = #{userCode}

select s.store_code, s.store_name, concat(s.province_name, s.downtown_name, s.area_name, s.address) address, su.user_name, su.tel from t_sys_user as du left join t_sys_store s on s.province_code = du.province_code and s.downtown_code = du.downtown_code and s.area_code = du.area_code left join t_sys_user as su on s.shopkeeper_code = su.user_code where du.user_code = #{userCode};
select count(user_code) from t_sys_user where is_delete = 0 and role = 2 and user_code = #{shopkeeperCode}
